title: Advertisement video for new game .
abstract:
I'm looking for someone to make me an animated video for a
game 3d that I have coming out I have all of the assets already needed to make
the game just need someone to put together the animation and make everything
work together I will provide my own voice over for the characters in the game
also You would just have to match the voice with the characters on screen I
would like a lot of action fighting I do and we'll go into more detail if you're
children for this project. Please submit any demos of work you have done so I
may better judge 3D Animation After Effects Animation Video Production
Video Services
keyphrases: effects animation video production,advertisement video, new game, video services, characters, animation,voice,   work,assets,screen,   lot

title: Short Form Video Editor (Tiktok / IG Reels / Youtube) .
abstract:
Hey! My name is Zach and I am a transformational life coach and
content creator: @zachweiss I need help editing my videos for short-form
(Tiktok, IG Reels, and Youtube Shorts). As a trial start for this project, I have
over 30+ hours of recorded zoom calls with coaching clients that I would like to
turn into micro-content. An example can be found here: You are free to use
whatever software you want, however, I personally have used a combination of
FCPX + Descript. If things go well, I would like to work with you long-term on
a continued basis. Regarding budget, I'd prefer to work on a pre-set retainer
once things take off. This would mean X 60-second videos for $X / month. In
your proposal, please send me some estimates. For now, let's trial it with 1-5
videos and ta... Video Editing Video Production Video Services Videography
keyphrases: short form video editor, video editing video production video services videography , youtube shorts , transformational life coach , tiktok,content creator, videos , zoom calls , trial start

title: Freelancer wanted to work in architectural and interior design .
abstract:
Please read the details carefully, we would like to agree with
freelancers to work on projects in the architectural and interior design in the
employment system for a number of hours to be agreed upon later. Business
idea: 1- A contract will be made with the terms and conditions and the value of
the contract through (Hire) inside the freelancer website. 2- The work is daily
from Saturday to Thursday, at a rate of 8 hours per day, with fixed dates in two
periods, starting from the first period (from 11 am to 3 pm) and the second
period (from 4 pm to 8 pm) Emirates time. 3- A personal interview will be
conducted for the freelancers with CVs and a good portfolio, through the Zoom
application. In the success of the interview, the contract will be agreed upon,
which will be written on the fre... 3ds Max AutoCAD Building Architecture
Interior Design Landscape Design
